title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript with a MongoDB database, and hosted on GitHub Pages.. Don't need much info about it, just scroll down. You're here only!

title: Canteen Website
description: A user-friendly canteen website for college students. This project features an online menu, order tracking, and canteen staff information. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP with a MySQL database.
